title: Doctor of Veterinary Murder
description: Recently widowed in a tragic ranching accident, Shiloh Bennett, DVM, opens a clinic in Tyler County, Kansas. As is typical in rural towns, she is related to several locals: a drug abuser, the county prosecutor, and a convicted felon seeking revenge for his incarceration.Now someone is pruning branches off Bennettâ€™s family tree. With the help of an oversized Kansas Trooper, she has to figure out who it is before she becomes the next downed limb.Also included is the short story "Weeding". True amnesia is medically rare. So after a wreck leaves Wayne Sonegay unable to remember anything from his recent life, he begins to wonder if he really wants to return to it.
author: Nishi Giefer
